column4: hi guys, i just finished installing ubuntu, need someones help gettin around places and finding some files, im comin from gentoo plz help me with few questions i have.
how do i disable gui login? i tried looking in /etc/rc.conf but didnt find anything there.
i dont want to remove gdm, i want to be able to turn it off. is there another way besides removing gdm?
booting with init 3 whont start gdm or x
